name: browserify-seed
description: seed for a browserified version of famous

scripts.build: cp -R static/ Build/www/ && browserify -t coffeeify --extension='.coffee' src/index.coffee -t cssify -t brfs | closure > Build/www/bundle.js
scripts.watch: watchify -t coffeeify --extension='.coffee' src/index.coffee -t cssify -t brfs -o Build/www/bundle.js --debug --verbose
scripts.lint: npm run lint-eslint; npm run lint-jscs

author: TheAlphaNerd
